description:
The Spider is the heart of Aeroe’s bikepacking storage system. The versatile design uses 2 composite mounting brackets that attach to your bike’s seatstays via nylon straps. It works on nearly any bike, including full suspension, from down-country to downhill, a moving rear triangle is no longer an issue. The upper cradle is made for a small dry bag or sleeping bag stuff sack. The platform can be rotated or even mounted on the side, so you can customize your rack to your gear, or your bike (think dropper post).

  • Seatstay mount design doesn’t need any hardware or frame mounting points
  • Touchpoints are protected with a silicone coating
  • Integrated straps secure your cargo and have a clean, svelte look
  • Upper cradle can be mounted inline with the frame or rotated up to 90° (with a 5mm Allen key)
  • Included cradle can be mounted on the top (as it ships) or on the sides, depending on your loadout
  • Stable design means zero sway
  • Fits tires up to 3.8 inches
  • More cradles and weatherproof pods available separately
name: Aeroe Spider Rear Rack
